speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: SCENE II. A Street.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: If the duke with the other dukes come not to

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: composition with the King of Hungary, why then all

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: the dukes fall upon the king.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Heaven grant us its peace, but not the King of

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Hungary's!

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Amen.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Thou concludest like the sanctimonious pirate, that

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: went to sea with the Ten Commandments, but scraped

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: one out of the table.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: 'Thou shalt not steal'?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Ay, that he razed.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Why, 'twas a commandment to command the captain and

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: all the rest from their functions: they put forth

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: to steal. There's not a soldier of us all, that, in

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: the thanksgiving before meat, do relish the petition

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: well that prays for peace.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: I never heard any soldier dislike it.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I believe thee; for I think thou never wast where

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: grace was said.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: No? a dozen times at least.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: What, in metre?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: In any proportion or in any language.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: I think, or in any religion.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Ay, why not? Grace is grace, despite of all

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: controversy: as, for example, thou thyself art a

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: wicked villain, despite of all grace.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Well, there went but a pair of shears between us.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I grant; as there may between the lists and the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: velvet. Thou art the list.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: And thou the velvet: thou art good velvet; thou'rt

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: a three-piled piece, I warrant thee: I had as lief

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: be a list of an English kersey as be piled, as thou

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: art piled, for a French velvet. Do I speak

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: feelingly now?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I think thou dost; and, indeed, with most painful

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: feeling of thy speech: I will, out of thine own

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: confession, learn to begin thy health; but, whilst I

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: live, forget to drink after thee.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: I think I have done myself wrong, have I not?

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Yes, that thou hast, whether thou art tainted or free.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Behold, behold. where Madam Mitigation comes! I

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: have purchased as many diseases under her roof as come to--

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: To what, I pray?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Judge.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: To three thousand dolours a year.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Ay, and more.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: A French crown more.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Thou art always figuring diseases in me; but thou

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: art full of error; I am sound.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Nay, not as one would say, healthy; but so sound as

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: things that are hollow: thy bones are hollow;

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: impiety has made a feast of thee.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Enter MISTRESS OVERDONE

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: How now! which of your hips has the most profound sciatica?

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Well, well; there's one yonder arrested and carried

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: to prison was worth five thousand of you all.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Who's that, I pray thee?

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Marry, sir, that's Claudio, Signior Claudio.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Claudio to prison? 'tis not so.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Nay, but I know 'tis so: I saw him arrested, saw

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: him carried away; and, which is more, within these

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: three days his head to be chopped off.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: But, after all this fooling, I would not have it so.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Art thou sure of this?

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: I am too sure of it: and it is for getting Madam

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Julietta with child.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Believe me, this may be: he promised to meet me two

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: hours since, and he was ever precise in

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: promise-keeping.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Besides, you know, it draws something near to the

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: speech we had to such a purpose.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: But, most of all, agreeing with the proclamation.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Away! let's go learn the truth of it.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exeunt LUCIO and Gentlemen

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Thus, what with the war, what with the sweat, what

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: with the gallows and what with poverty, I am

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: custom-shrunk.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Enter POMPEY

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: How now! what's the news with you?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Yonder man is carried to prison.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Well; what has he done?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: A woman.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: But what's his offence?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Groping for trouts in a peculiar river.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: What, is there a maid with child by him?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: No, but there's a woman with maid by him. You have

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: not heard of the proclamation, have you?

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: What proclamation, man?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: All houses in the suburbs of Vienna must be plucked down.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: And what shall become of those in the city?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: They shall stand for seed: they had gone down too,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: but that a wise burgher put in for them.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: But shall all our houses of resort in the suburbs be

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: pulled down?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: To the ground, mistress.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: Why, here's a change indeed in the commonwealth!

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: What shall become of me?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Come; fear you not: good counsellors lack no

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: clients: though you change your place, you need not

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: change your trade; I'll be your tapster still.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Courage! there will be pity taken on you: you that

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: have worn your eyes almost out in the service, you

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: will be considered.

speaker: MISTRESS OVERDONE
text_entry: What's to do here, Thomas tapster? let's withdraw.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Here comes Signior Claudio, led by the provost to

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: prison; and there's Madam Juliet.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter Provost, CLAUDIO, JULIET, and Officers

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Fellow, why dost thou show me thus to the world?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Bear me to prison, where I am committed.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I do it not in evil disposition,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: But from Lord Angelo by special charge.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Thus can the demigod Authority

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Make us pay down for our offence by weight

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The words of heaven; on whom it will, it will;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: On whom it will not, so; yet still 'tis just.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Re-enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Why, how now, Claudio! whence comes this restraint?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: From too much liberty, my Lucio, liberty:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: As surfeit is the father of much fast,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: So every scope by the immoderate use

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Turns to restraint. Our natures do pursue,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Like rats that ravin down their proper bane,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: A thirsty evil; and when we drink we die.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: If could speak so wisely under an arrest, I would

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: send for certain of my creditors: and yet, to say

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: the truth, I had as lief have the foppery of freedom

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: as the morality of imprisonment. What's thy

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: offence, Claudio?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: What but to speak of would offend again.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: What, is't murder?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: No.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Lechery?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Call it so.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Away, sir! you must go.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: One word, good friend. Lucio, a word with you.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: A hundred, if they'll do you any good.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Is lechery so look'd after?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Thus stands it with me: upon a true contract

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I got possession of Julietta's bed:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: You know the lady; she is fast my wife,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Save that we do the denunciation lack

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Of outward order: this we came not to,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Only for propagation of a dower

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Remaining in the coffer of her friends,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: From whom we thought it meet to hide our love

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Till time had made them for us. But it chances

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The stealth of our most mutual entertainment

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: With character too gross is writ on Juliet.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: With child, perhaps?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Unhappily, even so.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And the new deputy now for the duke--

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Whether it be the fault and glimpse of newness,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Or whether that the body public be

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: A horse whereon the governor doth ride,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Who, newly in the seat, that it may know

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: He can command, lets it straight feel the spur;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Whether the tyranny be in his place,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Or in his emmence that fills it up,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I stagger in:--but this new governor

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Awakes me all the enrolled penalties

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Which have, like unscour'd armour, hung by the wall

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: So long that nineteen zodiacs have gone round

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And none of them been worn; and, for a name,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Now puts the drowsy and neglected act

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Freshly on me: 'tis surely for a name.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I warrant it is: and thy head stands so tickle on

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: thy shoulders that a milkmaid, if she be in love,

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: may sigh it off. Send after the duke and appeal to

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: him.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I have done so, but he's not to be found.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I prithee, Lucio, do me this kind service:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: This day my sister should the cloister enter

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And there receive her approbation:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Acquaint her with the danger of my state:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Implore her, in my voice, that she make friends

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To the strict deputy; bid herself assay him:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I have great hope in that; for in her youth

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: There is a prone and speechless dialect,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Such as move men; beside, she hath prosperous art

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: When she will play with reason and discourse,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And well she can persuade.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I pray she may; as well for the encouragement of the

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: like, which else would stand under grievous

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: imposition, as for the enjoying of thy life, who I

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: would be sorry should be thus foolishly lost at a

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: game of tick-tack. I'll to her.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I thank you, good friend Lucio.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Within two hours.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Come, officer, away!

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Exeunt
